docs.snippet: MIRZA--Muzzi. 3/2/58 - 3/10/07 Your beloved family and many, many friends and colleagues will smile today as we remember your contagious laughter, your intuitive intellect, your generous friendship, and your indomitable spirit! You continue to ins...
docs.lead_paragraph:
MIRZA--Muzzi.

3/2/58 - 3/10/07 Your beloved family and many, many friends and colleagues will smile today as we remember your contagious laughter, your intuitive intellect, your generous friendship, and your indomitable spirit! You continue to inspire us to "dare to be great!"

docs.snippet: POPPER--Kathryn Trosper, passed away March 6, eleven days shy of her 101st birthday. She devoted her life to progressive causes with her husband of 43 years, Martin Popper, a famed attorney, who predeceased her. In 1945, Martin Popper co-founded t...
docs.lead_paragraph:
POPPER--Kathryn Trosper,

passed away March 6, eleven days shy of her 101st birthday. She devoted her life to progressive causes with her husband of 43 years, Martin Popper, a famed attorney, who predeceased her. In 1945, Martin Popper co-founded the law firm, Wolf Popper LLP. The partners of Wolf Popper remember Kathryn Popper with fondness and admiration.

docs.snippet: KOCH--Lynn and Lizzie. We miss you every day always remembering your values of humanity, devotion and your smile. We remain lost without you. With everlasting love, Paul and L.J....
docs.lead_paragraph:
KOCH--Lynn and Lizzie.

We miss you every day always remembering your values of humanity, devotion and your smile. We remain lost without you. With everlasting love, Paul and L.J.

headline.main: Pujols, Trout Star, Pitchers Struggle as Dodgers Tie Angels
headline.print_headline: Pujols, Trout Star, Pitchers Struggle as Dodgers Tie Angels

docs.snippet: Albert Pujols collected his first two hits since offseason foot surgery, Mike Trout tripled and doubled, and the Los Angeles Angels roughed up Scott Kazmir in a 13-13, nine-inning tie with the Los Angeles Dodgers on Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Albert Pujols collected his first two hits since offseason foot surgery, Mike Trout tripled and doubled, and the Los Angeles Angels roughed up Scott Kazmir in a 13-13, nine-inning tie with the Los Angeles Dodgers on Wednesday.

headline.main: China's Alibaba Says Agrees $3 Billion Five-Year Loan
headline.print_headline: China's Alibaba Says Agrees $3 Billion Five-Year Loan

docs.snippet: China's Alibaba Group Holding Ltd on Thursday said it has signed a deal for a $3 billion five-year loan, which will help the e-commerce giant as it snaps up stakes in companies within China and overseas....
docs.lead_paragraph: China's Alibaba Group Holding Ltd on Thursday said it has signed a deal for a $3 billion five-year loan, which will help the e-commerce giant as it snaps up stakes in companies within China and overseas.

headline.main: U.S. Warns Mosul Dam Collapse Would Be Catastrophic
headline.print_headline: U.S. Warns Mosul Dam Collapse Would Be Catastrophic

docs.snippet: The United States and Iraq on Wednesday hosted a meeting of senior diplomats and U.N. officials to discuss the possible collapse of the Mosul hydro-electric dam, which U.S. Ambassador Samantha Power said would create a catastrophe of "epic proport...
docs.lead_paragraph: The United States and Iraq on Wednesday hosted a meeting of senior diplomats and U.N. officials to discuss the possible collapse of the Mosul hydro-electric dam, which U.S. Ambassador Samantha Power said would create a catastrophe of "epic proportions."

headline.main: Citi Creates New Group Focused on Serving Fund Clients
headline.print_headline: Citi Creates New Group Focused on Serving Fund Clients

docs.snippet: Senior investment bankers Zubaid Ahmad and Brad Coleman will be leading a new group at Citigroup Inc focused on better serving clients that are private equity firms, hedge funds and sovereign wealth funds, according to a memo seen by Reuters on We...
docs.lead_paragraph: Senior investment bankers Zubaid Ahmad and Brad Coleman will be leading a new group at Citigroup Inc focused on better serving clients that are private equity firms, hedge funds and sovereign wealth funds, according to a memo seen by Reuters on Wednesday.

headline.main: Dean of Berkeley Law School Steps Down Amid Harassment Suit
headline.print_headline: Dean of Berkeley Law School Steps Down Amid Harassment Suit

docs.snippet: The dean of UC Berkeley's law school went on an indefinite leave of absence Wednesday after his executive assistant sued him over allegations of sexual harassment and the university for, in her view, not doing enough to prevent it....
docs.lead_paragraph: The dean of UC Berkeley's law school went on an indefinite leave of absence Wednesday after his executive assistant sued him over allegations of sexual harassment and the university for, in her view, not doing enough to prevent it.

headline.main: Charges Filed Against Widow of Discredited Police Lieutenant
headline.print_headline: Charges Filed Against Widow of Discredited Police Lieutenant

docs.snippet: The widow of a suburban Chicago police officer who authorities say staged his suicide to appear he was gunned down in the line of duty has been charged with conspiracy for allegedly helping her husband siphon money from a youth program....
docs.lead_paragraph: The widow of a suburban Chicago police officer who authorities say staged his suicide to appear he was gunned down in the line of duty has been charged with conspiracy for allegedly helping her husband siphon money from a youth program.
